entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 1. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming south 20 before morning. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 13 February 2023
